bugtrap03.bugdomain.bugReportNotification

Class Mailbox

  • java.lang.Object
    • bugtrap03.bugdomain.bugReportNotification.Mailbox
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CommentMailBox, CreationMailBox, TagMailBox

    public class Mailbox
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a mailbox for a user.
    Author:
    Group 03

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Mailbox()
      The constructor for a general mailbox.

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void activate()
      This method sets the terminated status to false;
      void addBox(Mailbox mb)
      This method adds a mailbox to the list of mailboxes belonging to this mailbox.
      protected void addNotification(Notification notif)
      This method adds a bugReportNotification to this mailbox.
      CommentMailBox commentSubscribe(Subject subject)
      This method makes a subscription to a subject for the creation of a comment on that subject.
      CreationMailBox creationSubscribe(AbstractSystemSubject abstractSystemSubject)
      This method makes a subscription to a subject for the creation of bugreport on that subject.
      purecollections.PList<Mailbox> getAllBoxes()
      This method returns all the mailboxes belonging to this mailbox.
      purecollections.PList<Notification> getAllNotifications()
      This method returns all the notifications belonging to this mailbox.
      java.lang.String getInfo()
      This method returns a string representing the information about this subscription.
      boolean isValidSubject(Subject subj)
      This method check if a given subject is valid or not.
      TagMailBox tagSubscribe(Subject subject)
      This method makes a subscription to a subject for all the tags on the bugreports related to that subject.
      TagMailBox tagSubscribe(Subject subject, java.util.EnumSet<Tag> tags)
      This method makes a subscription to a subject for the specified tags on the bugreports related to that subject.
      boolean unsubscribe(Mailbox mb)
      This method unsubscribes the mailbox by deleting the mailbox representing the subscription.

      • Mailbox

        public Mailbox()
        The constructor for a general mailbox.

    • Method Detail

      • getAllNotifications

        public purecollections.PList<Notification> getAllNotifications()
        This method returns all the notifications belonging to this mailbox. These are the notifications kept by the specific mail boxes of which this mailbox is composed.
        Returns:
        a PList of notifications belonging to this mailbox.

      • addNotification

        protected void addNotification(Notification notif)
                        throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        This method adds a bugReportNotification to this mailbox.
        Parameters:
        notif - The bugReportNotification to add.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      • getAllBoxes

        public purecollections.PList<Mailbox> getAllBoxes()
        This method returns all the mailboxes belonging to this mailbox. These are the mailboxes of which this mailbox is composed.
        Returns:
        A PList of mailboxes belonging to this mailbox.

      • addBox

        public void addBox(Mailbox mb)
            throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        This method adds a mailbox to the list of mailboxes belonging to this mailbox.
        Parameters:
        mb - The mailbox to add.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given mailbox is this mailbox
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given mailbox already is in your (sub)list of mailboxes

      • isValidSubject

        public boolean isValidSubject(Subject subj)
        This method check if a given subject is valid or not.
        Parameters:
        subj - The subject to test it's validity.
        Returns:
        True if the subject is not null.

      • getInfo

        public java.lang.String getInfo()
        This method returns a string representing the information about this subscription.
        Returns:
        A string with information.

      • tagSubscribe

        public TagMailBox tagSubscribe(Subject subject,
                               java.util.EnumSet<Tag> tags)
                        throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        This method makes a subscription to a subject for the specified tags on the bugreports related to that subject.
        Parameters:
        subject - The subject for the subscription.
        tags - The tags for which the subscription is interested.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if any of the arguments is invalid
        See Also:
        TagMailBox.TagMailBox(Subject, EnumSet)
